SEARCH
Package gw.api.financials

Class FinancialsCalculations

java.lang.Object
gw.api.financials.FinancialsCalculations
public class FinancialsCalculations extends Object
Provides instances of FinacialsCalculation that represent a particular Financials calculated amount, such as Available Reserves or Net Total Incurred.

    getRITotalCededReservesNonAdjustments()
    Returns an RIFinancialsCalculation representing Total Ceded Reserves non-adjustments, which is sum of all RICededReserve non-adjustment transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
    static FinancialsCalculator
    getRITotalIncurred()
    Returns a FinancialCalculator representing the amount paid or to be paid on a claim (payments + open reserves net the amount recovered or to be recovered (recoveries + RI open ceded reserves)
    static FinancialsCalculator
    getRITotalRecoverables()
    Returns an RIFinancialsCalculation representing Total RIRecoverables, which is sum of all RIRecoverable transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.

  • Method Details

    • getFinancialsCalculation

      public static FinancialsCalculator getFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
      Gets a FinancialsCalculator for an arbitrary FinancialsExpression. This expression may be a composite expression, i.e. it may consist of multiple financial expressions combined with .plus( ) and/or .minus( )
      Parameters:
      expression - the FinancialsExpression to be encapulated by this calculation.
      Returns:
      a FinancialsCalculator for getting the calculated value represented by the provided FinancialsExpression

    • getRIFinancialsCalculation

      public static FinancialsCalculator getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression expression)
      Get expression as a RIFinancialsCalculation.
      Parameters:
      expression - the FinancialsExpression to be encapulated by this calculation.
      Returns:
      an RIFinancialsCalculator for getting the calculated value represented by the provided FinancialsExpression

    • getOpenReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getOpenReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Open Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today).

      Returns:
      NewFinancialCalculationPackager

    • getTotalReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Reserves:

      Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalReservesIncludingPending

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalReservesIncludingPending()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Reserves with Pending:

      Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today + Pending-approval reserves.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

    • getAvailableReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getAvailableReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Available Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today + Future eroding payments + Pending-approval eroding payments).

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getAwaitingSubmissionReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getAwaitingSubmissionReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Awaiting Submission Reserves:

      (Awaiting Submission reserves for today)

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

      (Awaiting Submission payments - Eroding)

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

    • getRISubmittedTotalIncurred

      public static FinancialsCalculator getRISubmittedTotalIncurred()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Reinsurance Submitted Total Incurred

      RISubmittedNetNetPayments + RISubmittedNetNetReserves

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalErodingPayments

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalErodingPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Eroding Payments:

      Committed eroding payments + Awaiting submission eroding payments for today.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalRecoveries

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalRecoveries()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Recoveries, which is all submitted recoveries. The return type of
      invalid reference 
      gw.api.financials.FinancialsCalculationRecoveryCategory
      allows for the calculation to optionally be limited to a specific RecoveryCategory.
      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalPayments

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Payments:

      Submitted payments + Awaiting Submission payments for today.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalPaymentsIncludingPending

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalPaymentsIncludingPending()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Payments with Pending:

      Submitted payments + Awaiting Submission payments for today + Future payments + Pending-approval payments.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

    • getSubmittedTotalPayments

      public static FinancialsCalculator getSubmittedTotalPayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Total Payments:

      Submitted payments + Awaiting Submission payments for today.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

    • getFuturePayments

      public static FinancialsCalculator getFuturePayments()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Future Payments, i.e., Awaiting submission payments whose owning check's scheduled send date is after the current day.
      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getRIOpenCededReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getRIOpenCededReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsExpression representing Open Ceded Reserves, which is sum of all RICededReserve transactions in Submitting/Submitted status.
      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalIncurredGross

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalIncurredGross()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Gross Total Incurred:

      Open Reserves + Total Payments.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalIncurredNet

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalIncurredNet()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Net Total Incurred:

      (Open Reserves + Total Payments)
      -
      Total Recoveries.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

    • getTotalIncurredNetMinusOpenRecoveryReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalIncurredNetMinusOpenRecoveryReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Net Total Incurred Minus Open Recovery Reserves (Total Incurred Gross minus Total Recovery Reserves):

      (Open Reserves + Total Payments)
      -
      Total Recovery Reserves.

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator representing the defined calculation.

    • getRemainingReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getRemainingReserves()
      Returns a FinancialsCalculator representing Remaining Reserves:

      (Submitted reserves + Awaiting Submission reserves for today)
      -
      (Submitted eroding payments + Awaiting Submission eroding payments for today + Future eroding payments).

      Returns:
      FinancialsCalculator

      public static FinancialsCalculator getTotalReservesWithPending()

    • getRINetNetReserves

      public static FinancialsCalculator getRINetNetReserves()
      Returns a FinancialCalculator representing Open Reserves net RI open ceded reserves
      Returns:
      an RIFinancialCalculator. Use getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression) to turn it into an RIFinancialsCalculation

    • getRITotalIncurred

      public static FinancialsCalculator getRITotalIncurred()
      Returns a FinancialCalculator representing the amount paid or to be paid on a claim (payments + open reserves net the amount recovered or to be recovered (recoveries + RI open ceded reserves)
      Returns:
      an RIFinancialCalculator. Use getRIFinancialsCalculation(FinancialsExpression) to turn it into an RIFinancialsCalculation

    • getFloatingFinancials

      public static FloatingFinancialsCalculations getFloatingFinancials()
      Returns an intermediate object "FloatingFinancials" which contains properties for obtaining the FloatingFinancials versions of a FinancialsCalculator. The intermediate object is used to segregate the floating financials versions from the fixed version of the calculations.
      Returns:
      a FloatingFinancials object. This has only a subset of the calculations that a FinancialsCalculator has: just the ones that are relevant for FloatingFinancials
